value:
I believe Prince Alfonse will be a
fine king. He reminds me of Prince
Marth in a way.

In these moments of quiet,
I sometimes reflect on bygone
days with my siblings...

These days I am known as the
Red Dragoon... In better days I
rode an adorable pegasus...

My brother Michalis and I each
made our own choices... I had to
execute him with my own hands.

Michalis and I will never be as
siblings again. But I shall always
wish happiness for our sister, Maria.

An acquaintance of yours bid me
come wish you well. Who? It was
$Nf.

Witness the fearsome power of the
Red Dragoon!

So...I had not reached my full
potential...

Michalis was always a step ahead.
I cannot compare...

You have my gratitude. I will show it
by my victories.

I am Minerva, Princess of Macedon.
I will never hesitate in my duty.
Ask—and it will be done.

I do not have what is required of a
ruler. During my time ruling in place
of my brother...$k$pI have allowed rebellion, been
captured, and displayed my own
powerlessness and disgrace.$k$pPerhaps I could better rule with a
tactician like you at my side...$k$pYou have a unique quality about
you—you make me feel as if...$k$pI still have much I can accomplish.
Thank you for that. I swear to not
give up and to look to the future.
はぁっ！
でぇいっ！
うああっ！
You!
Face me, coward!
I will end this swiftly.
Make peace with your gods.
You poor fool...
Unworthy...
Heh
Mm? Did you need something?
Is that how you greet people in your homeland?
I will fight with honor, if not pride.
I shall never ascend the throne. I do not have the capacity to rule.
Let us restore peace to the people of this world together.
I remember days of light and laughter...
Anytime you wish to speak, do not hesitate.
Yes?
Orders?
Onward.
